H0.text: what was the first kind of vertebrate to exist on earth. Pikaia

H1.text: what was the first kind of vertebrate to exist on earth. Cephalochordata

H2.text: what was the first kind of vertebrate to exist on earth. Tunicata

H3.text: what was the first kind of vertebrate to exist on earth. Myllokunmingia

A4.text: It is among the oldest possible craniates, found in the lower Cambrian Chengjiang (518 million years ago).

A5.text: It appears to have a skull and skeletal structures made of cartilage.
